name: Tokyo's Midnight | 東京の真夜中

metadata.name: TOKYO'S MIDNIGHT | 東京の真夜中 #1/133
metadata.description:
In Shibuya's midnight neon glare,  
The city's heartbeat fills the air,  
Billboards flashing, colors bright,  
A symphony of electric light.

Raindrops dance upon the street,  
A rhythmic sound, a steady beat,  
Pedestrians rush through the night,  
Lost in the city's frenzied sight.

Amidst the chaos, I stand still,  
In awe of the urban thrill,  
The energy pulsing all around,  
A magic in this concrete town.

So I'll soak it in, this neon scene,  
In Shibuya's midnight dream.

By: Ilan Derech  
Collaboration Drop: PROOF Collective  
Location: Tokyo, Japan  
Shot on: Leica Q2  
Year: 2023
